pages.title: 关于
pages.text: 博客之旅又一次的心潮澎湃，这就是本博客的来源 博客信息基本信息使用Hexo搭建，主题为Keep，服务商选用GitHub Pages及Cloudflare Pages(均可进入，内容同步)使用GitHub 托管源代码，并用Workflow发布到GitHub Pages，Cloudflare监测更新并部署到Cloudflare Pages 感谢背景SVG来自：FFFUEL.co ttten 我是谁？一个平平无奇的学生GitHub：MoinkE-Mail: cnmoink

posts.title: 博客搭建记录
posts.excerpt: 搭建需求 能用的大脑 能用的设备（包括Android）
posts.text: 搭建需求 能用的大脑 能用的设备（包括Android） 环境依赖安装nodejs，npm，yarn，必要时需要make automake autoconf等编译工具本人采用Termux（Android） 流程! 请务必确保可以连接网络 安装123yarn global add hexo-clihexo init blog # 此过程需要连接到GitHub仓库，请确保网络畅通cd blog 主题1yarn add hexo-theme-keep (采用本博客所用主题) 1cp node_modules/hexo-theme-keep/_config.yml _config.keep.yml 主题配置文件即为_config.keep.yml，配置项请参见主题文档 插件12345678yarn add hexo-clean-css # css压缩yarn add hexo-generator-feed # rss订阅yarn add hexo-generator-json-content #json搜索yarn add hexo-generator-searchdb # 搜索数据库yarn add hexo-html-minifier # html压缩yarn add hexo-permalink-pinyin # 博客文件名转为拼音yarn add hexo-uglify # js压缩yarn add hexo-wordcount # 博文长度统计 配置文件_config.yml 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627permalink_pinyin: enable: true separator: '-' # default: '-'html_minifier: collapseBooleanAttributes: true collapseWhitespace: true # Ignore '<!-- more -->' https://hexo.io/docs/tag-plugins#Post-Excerpt ignoreCustomComments: [ !!js/regexp /^\s*more/] removeComments: true removeEmptyAttributes: true removeScriptTypeAttributes: true removeStyleLinkTypeAttributes: true minifyJS: true minifyCSS: trueclean_css: exclude: - '*.min.css'uglify: mangle: true output: compress: exclude: - '*.min.js' 基本配置_config.yml Site区： 12345678# Sitetitle: 博客标题subtitle: '副标题'description: '描述（seo）'keywords: 关键字author: 作者language: zh-CNtimezone: 'Aisa/Shanghai' URL区： 1234# URLurl: 博客地址(例如：https://example.com)pretty_urls: trailing_index: false # 美化url地址 博客配置完成 部署可选GitHub Pages和Cloudflare Pages，如有自己域名，推荐Cloudflare Pages这两个部署方式均需要GitHub 流程创建私有库创建链接仓库名任选勾选Private GitHub Pages部署方式生成GitHub Token打开 https://github.com/settings/tokens 私有库设置打开创建私有库的设置https://github.com/GitHub用户名/你创建的私有库名/settings/secrets/actions添加密钥HEXO_DEPLOY，值为你的刚刚生成的Token 创建公开库库名:修改为自己GitHub用户名.github.io 部署自动流程打开本地博客目录，新建.github/workflows目录，创建并编辑.github/workflows/hexo-deploy.yml 内容： 1234567891011121314151617181920name: deploying Hexo project to GitHub pageson: push: branches: - mainjobs: build-and-deploy: runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - name: Checkout uses: actions/checkout@master - name: Build and Deploy uses: theme-keep/hexo-deploy-github-pages-action@master # 使用专门部署 Hexo 到 GitHub pages 的 action env: PERSONAL_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.HEXO_DEPLOY }} # secret 名 PUBLISH_REPOSITORY: 修改为自己GitHub用户名/修改为自己GitHub 用户名.github.io BRANCH: gh-pages PUBLISH_DIR: ./public 完成部署打开本地博客目录 123456git initgit remote add origin git@github.com:用户名/私有库名.gitgit branch -M maingit add .git commit -m "hello world"git push 等待2分钟左右，访问用户名.github.io即可Cloudflare Pages部署方式注册账户，进入控制台，打开Pages页面连接到GitHub，登录账户，在GitHub 中选择生效的库为你创建的私有库部署命令填为：hexo generate环境变量添加：NODE_VERSION 值 16.18.1PYTHON_VERSION 值 3.7 打开本地博客目录 123456git initgit remote add origin git@github.com:用户名/私有库名.gitgit branch -M maingit add .git commit -m "hello world"git push 等待2分钟左右打开Cloudflare给出站点查看效果

posts.title: Markdown测试
posts.text: This README can be used as a reference for github-flavored-markdown styling (and possibly behavior). H1followed by some text H2followed by some text H3followed by some text H4followed by some text H5followed by some text H6followed by some text Auto-detected link: http://www.france.com Some Ignored_multiple_underscore_italics here A line of normal text with inline code and italics, strong font, and even some μ†ℱ ╋ℯ╳╋. Followed by lots of Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis id sem purus, eu commodo tortor. Donec malesuada ultricies dolor a eleifend. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Vivamus a faucibus ligula. Nullam molestie tristique arcu, eu elementum metus ultricies sed. Aenean luctus congue lectus, vitae semper erat rhoncus non. Nulla facilisi. Followed by another line of normal text with inline code and italics, strong font, and even some μ†ℱ ╋ℯ╳╋. Followed by lots of Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis id sem purus, eu commodo tortor. Donec malesuada ultricies dolor a eleifend. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Vivamus a faucibus ligula. Nullam molestie tristique arcu, eu elementum metus ultricies sed. Aenean luctus congue lectus, vitae semper erat rhoncus non. Nulla facilisi. Thin horizontal rule: – Thick horizontal rule: Table Header 1 Table Header 2 Content http://example.org Content http://localhost:\<port> Text right below table. Follows is a table with an empty cell, and unaligned indenting. Table Header 1 Table Header 2 Content Cntent Content Empty line between table and this text def this_is puts "some #{4-space-indent} code" end def this_is puts "some #{code tag} code" end def this_is puts "some #{pre tag} code" end 123def this_is puts "some #{fenced} code"end 123456class Classy def this_is puts "some #{colored} ruby code with ruby syntax highlighting" @someobj.do_it(1, 2) endend 123var test = function this_is(){ console.log("some" + colored + "javascript code with javascript syntax highlighting really long");} 1234(defproject myproject "0.5.0-SNAPSHOT" :description "Some clojure code with syntax highlighting." :dependencies [[org.clojure/clojure "1.5.1"]] :plugins [[lein-tar "3.2.0"]]) 123var test = function this_is(){ console.log("language declared as 'js' instead");} 123var test = function this_is(){ console.log("language declared as bogus_language");} here is blockquote Relative image link
